properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_CART ( CA_NO , BK_NO_OR , MEM_NO_OR , AMOUNT , TOTAL_PRICE , BK_TITLE , AUTHOR , ORIGIN_PRICE , PRICE , MAIN_IMG ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT CA_NO , BK_NO_OR , MEM_NO_OR , AMOUNT , TOTAL_PRICE , STATUS , BK_TITLE , AUTHOR , ORIGIN_PRICE , PRICE , MAIN_IMG FROM TB_CART C JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (C.MEM_NO_OR = M.MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ?
